Name: Hentai Waifu
About the game: Hentai Waifu is a casual puzzle game, where you reveal gorgeous girls pictures while you relax in a 3 difficulties puzzle. 10 Gorgeous girls that can be undressed Puzzles with 3 levels of difficult Gallery mode that can be controlled using a single hand. (arrows or WASD) 69 fun to get achievements Puzzles can be solved with the click of a button Original relaxing soundtrack
